attributes.action: To give free parking for members at the abbey leisure centre in barking
attributes.background: A new leisure has opened in Barking. Only problem is, it's £2.10 per hour to park your car their! If I'm there for 2 hours per day thats £29.40 per week = £117.60 per month + my monthly membership of £47.50 per month. That's a total of £ 165.10 per month just to use the leisure facility's.

rejection.details:
The price of parking at the Abbey Leisure Centre is the responsibility of your borough council: the London Borough of Dagenham and Barking, not the UK Government or Parliament.

If you would like to take up this issue with your borough council, here is the link to their complaints page: https://www.lbbd.gov.uk/council/complaints-and-feedback/complaints-about-council-services/how-to-complain/
